description: CAREY D. LOHRENZ was one of the first female F-14 Tomcat fighter pilots in the US Navy. Lohrenz has translated her leadership and strategy experience in the Navy to help top business leaders of Forbes Global 2000 and Fortune 500 companies supercharge their performance in today’s competitive business environments, adapt strategies under pressure, reduce errors, and overcome obstacles along the way.
name: Carey D. Lohrenz
